bibl.title: 簡明古漢語同義詞詞典

sense.def: in order then to
then
then
e.g. 回也聞一以知十 "Hui, when he heard one thing, then understood ten things": and then, thereby, so as to then, as a result

entry.def: Yǐ 以 refers to the use of things as instruments for a given purpose and rarely involves the using up of resources.

sense.def: =所以：e.g. 無以知人 "does not that by which to understand men": that whereby, that wherewith

e.g. 以顯父母 "in this way make the parents illustrious": using this means> by this means> in this way; with the contextually determinate object, by use of the contextually determinate object/method (the pronominal object of the preposition is omitted)
to V using (oneself)
by means of V-ing
using as an instrument> e.g. 以卵投石 "dash a stone with an egg" by means of, with
e.g. 以孔子之聖 "even if one has the (superb) sagacity of a Confucius": even if using> although one has and uses
以己度人"using oneself to measure others" using (oneself)> with one's own things, by one's own standards
e.g. 道之以德 "guide them through virtue": To V by using> by means of N; with
e.g. 文王以百里 "King Wen (became a great king) with one hundred leagues square": using> with (something) (perform a contextually determinate action or behaviour)
e.g. 不以目而以心 "not use they eyes but use the mind": make use of; make proper or meaningful use of
e.g. 以身教 "instruct through one's own person" using one's own person
e.g. 山以之高 "the mountains are high by virtue of it" by virtue of npro
e.g. 以鞿羈 "use (the cultivation of beauty) as my bridle and reins": use something contextually determinate N1 as one's N2
e.g. 勉主以禮義 "encourge the ruler by meanins of ritual propriety and righteousness": by means of
e.g. 以此規 "apply these rules": apply; implement
e.g. 禮以行之 "using ritual propriety to put things into practice": using the preceding N to V
e.g. 以近知遠 "basing oneself on the near understand the distant": making intellectual use of; basing oneself on
e.g. 處之以遵道 'to deal with them by following the right way'': to V2 by V1-ing
得之以強 "become strong by gaining it": to V1 by V2-ing

gramGrp.tls:sem-feat: postnominal instrumental, N and N coreferential

sense.def: using the N to V
e.g. 以孔子之聖 "even with Confucius' sagacity": even with, even given
=於 in relation to
hoping in this way to V
think of, take notice of, be specially concerned for
e.g. 君子學以致其道 "the true gentleman studies in order to reach the Way": intending thereby to, in order to; in order to; so that one can
to accompany somebody
＝與 e.g. 行役以婦人 "when travelling on service he is with his wife": be in the company of, have the company of
小人甘以壞 "the petty man is sweet but ruins things": but in spite of this; but for all that
e.g. 十八年 "was born in the 18th year" at the time N
in the place N

entry.def: Yǐ 以 "as a SUBJECT" functions quite regularly as a subordinate copula in classical Chinese.

sense.def: e.g. 以美其身 "in order to beautify his person": in order to
for
for N, for the sake of N
be used for V-ing, serve the purpose to V
e.g. 以此不信 "consider this to be untrustworthy": think that the N Vs [[Several bad examples have to be removed]]
consider (oneself) to V
e.g. 以美於徐公 "consider me to be more handsome than Xu" believe that N V-s
consider N to be (the) N{PRED}
believe that S

bibl.title: 簡明古漢語同義詞詞典

sense.def: e.g. 以告(君）"reported the matter (to the ruler) object marker: 把它
e.g. 教以孝 "teach filial piety": "preposition" introducing direct object of transitive verb
object marker: e.g. 子以四教"The Master taught four things" [[THESE ATTRIBUTIONS ARE A COMPLETE MESS AS IT STANDS.KRAUT UND RÜBEN!]]
e.g. 以治天下為事 "take the government of the world to be one's business" consider N1 as N2; make N2 of N1 [should not be split?]
functions like 把：以楚霸"cause Chu to become the hegemon"
e.g. 象以典刑 "He made a (delineation=)full description of the legal punishments"object marker
e.g. 告之以大古 "to inform them about the most remote antiquity", preposition introducing direct object
like 把：Vtt the object N1 to the indirect object N2
taking the object N to V it
= yi3 已: already
=與 together with
with N in one's care; in the company of
marking the agent in passive constructions
to cause that S, to ensure that S
so that in effect, so as to

entry.def: The standard word is yǐ 以 "by reason of" which can refer to objective causes as well as subjective motivation.

sense.def: e.g. 楚國以安 "Chu was safe because of this": because of this contextually determinate factor
e.g. 違我以禮 "offends me on the pretext of ritual propriety: on the pretext of
以有功見疑，"was held in suspicion because he had achievements": objective reason: because of S1 S2 occurred/will occur/occurs
because of (an objective factor N)
on the grounds of; because of
e.g. 以尊也 "it was because he was distinguished": be because of N
e.g. 以晏短為小們"because Yan was short they built a small gate": on the (subjective) grounds that S
e.g. 以誹死 "die because of slander" to V because of Nab
to V on the grounds of N, reasoning in terms of N, on the pretexts of N
because of V-ing; because one V-ed
以其有辨也 "it was because they possess the art of distinguishing (between each other)": it is because S; the cause is that S
be because of V-ing
because of this to V
e.g. 何以哉 "what to do" use as an action (to deal with a situation)
何以哉 "what to do" do a thing (with preposed pronominal object)
e.g. 取道者不以手而以耳 "the one who chooses the Way does so not relying on his hands but relying on his ears": rely on
being able to rely on; being able to base oneself on; on the basis of; given the fact of Nab
relying on the contextually determinate N, thanks to it
at the time of N (preposition introducing time complements)
at the time of N (preposition introducing postverbal time complements)
risking N to V; at risk to N to V
以編戶之民 "as a simple person from an ordinary home" as a, being a; in one's capacity as a
e.g. 以己不從人 "themselves they did not obey others" as the person one is> themselves (oneself)
葬之以侯 "bury him as if he were a marquis" (V someone) as an N

entry.def: Yǐ 以 is normally between a non-main and a main VP but may occasionally be purely coordinating and equivalent to ér 而. [VERBAL-SCOPE]

sense.def: and in that connection, and in that capacity
and
on the basis of the contextually determinate N to V
(toV) so that S

entry.def: Yǐ 以 refers to conformity construed as a matter of availing oneself of something as an instrument or guideline.

sense.def: 使民以時 "employ the people according to the seasons" in accordance with, according to
e.g. 取人以己 "select people by one's own standard": in accordance with (oneself)
e.g. 以道事君 "serve the ruler according to the Way": according to, in the way of (emperor Yáo etc); according to (the right season)
e.g. 以己知人 "understand others on the basis of oneself": in accordance with/on the basis of (oneself)
in accordance with N
必以信 "be sure to conform to good faith": use/conform to as a standard of behaviour
conforming to N/in the opinion of N
e.g. 以治情 "to control one's natural propensities in accordance with it": in accordance with the contextually determinate N
using this contextually determinate method> and thus, and in this way
because of this contextually determinate N
and; and (thereby), and thus, so as to
thus, in that way, by that method, in conformity with that
under these contextually determinate conditions

entry.def: Yǐ 以 is only occasionally nominalised and construes the grounds as something used by the consequence in order for it to be established, and the image is of the use a subject makes, in the course of some action, of something else.

sense.def: e.g. 必有以也 "there must be a reason": reason, grounds
behave like (a scoundrel etc)
be provided with???
archaic: e.g. 不吾以 "they do not employ me" employ
e.g. 怨乎不以 "be resentful that they are not employed": be employed, get employed
when employing N then V
having (something): leading along, taking along (introduces an object which the actor has or leads along during the action;
taking a contextually determinate object along
with the offer of, offering as a present in the process;
taking along and accompanying
using, on the basis of
using; with; on the basis of
